articles.title: DPRK Permanent Representative Sends Message to President of UNSC
articles.content:
DPRK Permanent Representative Sends Message to President of UNSC
Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Sin Son Ho, permanent representative of the DPRK at the UN, sent the following message to  Claude Heller, president of the UNSC, on Tuesday as regards the grave situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula:
					 On May 20, 2010, the United States and the south Korean authorities released the "investigation result" that forcibly linked the sinking of the south Korean warship "Cheonan" with the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 The DPRK straight away and totally rejected the "investigation result" and clarified its position that it has nothing to do with the incident, proposing that it will dispatch to the site of the incident its own inspection group of the National Defence Commission in order to conduct an objective evaluation on the "investigation result".
					
					 It would be very useful to remind ourselves of the ever more increasing international doubts and criticisms going beyond the internal boundary of south Korea, over the "investigation result" from the very moment of its release.
					
					 As days go by, the objective and scientific military analysis and the environment surrounding the incident reveal that the incident is a fabricated scenario, purely out of political and military purposes of the U.S.
					
					 The key to resolving the case lies in that the DPRK which is the victim takes an opportunity to verify and confirm the "investigation result" on a scientific and objective basis.
					
					 It is imperative for the United Nations Security Council not to step into the same situation as it was once misused as a tool of high handedness and hegemony of the United States by giving legitimacy over to its armed invasion into Iraq, based on a single word of lies of Powell in February 2003.
					
					 The United Nations Security Council is strictly duty bound to adhere to the principles of respect for sovereignty and impartiality of UN Member States, as enshrined in the UN Charter. 
					
					 The United Nations Security Council is an organization with the securing of the global peace and security as a lifeline in its mission. If the United Nations Security Council, as an organization of such a mission, is in its genuine wish for peace and security on the Korean Peninsula, where a touch and go situation has been created due to the incident of "Cheonan", it should take, first of all, measures that can lead the U.S. and south Korea to receive the inspection group of the National Defence Commission as already proposed by the DPRK, the victim, to help verify the "investigation result".
					
					 By doing so, the United Nations Security Council should give utmost priority to bringing to light the very truth of the incident, on an impartial and objective basis.
					
					 In case the unilaterally forged "investigation result" is put on the agenda of the United Nations Security Council and open to be debated without the verification of the directly victimized party, it will be more than clear that the sovereignty and security of the DPRK is infringed upon, and by then no one would dare imagine how serious its consequences would be with regard to the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 On this occasion I would like to enclose herewith a copy of the answer by the spokesman of the DPRK Foreign Ministry dated 4 June 2010 and kindly request you to circulate it as document of the United Nations Security Council.

articles.title: "Cheonan" Case Dismissed as Sheer Fabrication
articles.content:
"Cheonan" Case Dismissed as Sheer Fabrication
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegate, addressing the Geneva Disarmament Conference on June 3, said that the case of warship "Cheonan's" sinking was, to all intents and purposes,  "a conspiratorial farce" and "charade" orchestrated by the south Korean authorities at the U.S prodding. 
					 He said: The south Korean authorities have linked the above-said case with the DPRK since its very outset without any material evidence under the zealous patronage of the U.S. and finally announced the "investigation results" asserting that the warship was sunken by a "torpedo attack" of the DPRK and are now foolishly working to prod the UN Security Council into slapping even additional "sanctions" against it, crying out for "punishment" and "retaliation."
					
					 As already clarified, the DPRK has nothing to do with the above-said case, he noted, and continued:
					
					 As universally known, the DPRK is busy waging a general offensive to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012.
					
					 From the viewpoint of common sense that development presupposes peace, peaceful international environment is more urgently required by the DPRK than in any other time.
					
					 Whoever has reason can have strong doubt about south Korea's assertion that the DPRK was involved in the above-said case.
					
					 Such shocking case as the sinking of the warship "Cheonan" is required only by the south Korean authorities making desperate efforts to hold in check the progress of the DPRK through a campaign against it.
					
					 Invariable is the stand of the DPRK government to build a solid peace-keeping regime in the Korean Peninsula and denuclearize it, he declared, and went on:
					
					 The earlier conclusion of a peace treaty on the peninsula still in the state of ceasefire would help build confidence necessary for the denuclearization as soon as possible.
					
					 The conclusion of the peace treaty provides the only reasonable and realistic way for realizing the denuclearization of the peninsula.

articles.title: Fidel Castro Ruz Comments on "Cheonan" Case
articles.content:
Fidel Castro Ruz Comments on "Cheonan" Case
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Fidel Castro Ruz, leader of the Cuban revolution, in an article titled "The Empire and the Lie" contributed to the June 4 issue of Granma expressed his view on the sinking of warship "Cheonan" of the south Korean puppet navy. 
					 He cited the following information sources disclosing the United States' deceptive nature of the case of the warship sinking:
					
					 "The sources suspect that the attack on warship 'Cheonan' was a false flag operation orchestrated by the U.S. to make believe the attack was coming from north Korea."
					
					 "One of the U.S main purposes of increasing tension in the Korean Peninsula was to put pressure on Japanese Prime Minister Hatoyama to make him change his policy on the U.S. forces base. Hatoyama has admitted that tensions over the sinking of the 'Cheonan' had a significant influence on his decision to allow the U.S. marines to stay in Okinawa."
					
					 "As the 'Cheonan' was sunk, there were four ships of the U.S. Navy in the sector, as part of the U.S.-South Korea exercise Foal Eagle. An investigation into the metal and chemical traces of the suspicious 'torpedo' shows that they are not the DPRK's."
					
					 "The presence of the USS 'Salvor,' one of the ships taking part in the Foal Eagle, so close to the Paekryong Islet during the sinking of the south Korean warship raises questions, too."
					
					 In the final analysis, the U.S. could do too easily such big job, ie, the operation to eliminate the coalition government of Hatoyama but it is paying a very dear price for what it has done, he observed.
					
					 The political leaders and the world public opinion have proof of the cynicism and absolute lack of scruples that characterize the United States' imperial policy, he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Portuguese President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Portuguese President
Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Anibal Cavaco Silva, President of Portugal, on its national day.
					Kim in the message wished the Portuguese President and government success in their work.

articles.title: Training Centre of Young Musicians
articles.content:
Training Centre of Young Musicians
Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Kyongsang Kindergarten in Central District, Pyongyang, has produced many young musicians.
					A lot of girls and boys who studied music at the kindergarten have grown up to be local and international music concours winners and conductors, creators, performers and teachers of such famous art troupes as State Merited Chorus, Unhasu Orchestra, Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe and State Symphony Orchestra, and art education institutions, including Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory. 
					
					Among those who studied at the kindergarten are Ma Sin A who played the piano well in the concert marking the Day of the Sun, the birthday of the President Kim Il Sung, in April this year and Yu Pyol Mi who won the top prize and special prize in the 56th Schumann International Juvenile Piano Concours. 
					
					The kindergarten has made many teaching aids, books and videos suitable for the children's feelings for their education. It has also contributed to the development of early musical education in the country.
					
					Teachers who are in charge of their basic musical education are graduates from Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory. 
					
					The kindergarten has commuter buses for its children.

articles.title: US Moves for World Domination Flayed
articles.content:
US Moves for World Domination Flayed
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A supersonic drone of the U.S. Air Force recently made a test flight. The U.S. PAC-3 interceptor missiles and more than 100 troops were also deployed in its forces base in Morag area Northeast of Poland. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. desperate efforts to develop prompt strike weapons and establish a missile defense system are aimed to hold an unchallenged military edge and realize its strategy for aggression and world domination. 
					
					 Its arms buildup and MD moves spark off a new arms race in the international arena, quite contrary to the trend of history and human desire for peace.
					
					 The production of new offensive and defensive means would naturally prompt the production of another weapon to cope with them. 
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that those countries worrying about the U.S. moves to retain more competitive military edge would buckle down to developing a new weapon.
					
					 It is a great crime to turn science and technology into evil account i.e. world domination even though they should be used for development of human civilization and promotion of people's wellbeing.
					
					 Peace can never go together with arms expansion.
					
					 The U.S. is prone to pay lip-service to "ensuring peace and stability". They are, however, nothing but rhetoric to cover up its peace-disturbing crimes.
					
					 With no trite artifice can the U.S. conceal its crimes and nature as a chief culprit touching off the worldwide arms race and disturbing global peace and security.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative's Remarks about "Nature of System" Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative's Remarks about "Nature of System" Blasted
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak, referring to the case of warship sinking, let loose a whole string of jargons blustering that "it is necessary to establish the nature of system" and the like and underscoring the need to handle the "education of the younger generation" from that viewpoint. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 What he uttered is, in a nutshell, a revelation of his sinister intention to mercilessly suppress progressive forces accusing his conservative group of orchestrating such unprecedented anti-DPRK farce called the case of warship sinking under the pretext of "establishing the nature of system" and prop up and consolidate its pro-U.S. fascist, anti-reunification and confrontational dictatorial system under the guise of "pragmatism." 
					
					 The "nature of system" much touted by the conservative group means an unpopular fascist dictatorial system the keynote of which is sycophancy towards the U.S. and confrontation against reunification and represents a crime-woven history in which it has mercilessly suppressed progressive forces for opposing the dictatorial rule by labeling them "pro-north left-wing forces". 
					
					 The south Korean chief executive's reckless remarks whitewashing such reactionary things with the phraseology of "nature of system" and asserting "it is necessary" to establish it are nothing but a despicable ploy to quell at the point of bayonet the anti-"government" sentiment growing stronger among the progressive forces with the conspiratorial case of warship sinking as a momentum and prop up his shaking conservative regime at any cost. 
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the traitor linked the issue of the "nature of system" with the issue of "education of the younger generation".
					
					 Now that the inside story about the case of warship sinking is being brought to light to prove that it was an anti-DPRK farce orchestrated by the group of traitors, it is now becoming fretful about when youth and students and other people critical of the farce will rise up in a mass anti-"government" struggle. 
					
					 The above-said outbursts let loose by the south Korean chief executive only reflect such fear. They are, in essence, no more than a fascist order to make the young generation give up their resistance against the pro-U.S. dictatorial system but meekly obey it. 
					
					 The puppet group's row about "nature of system" is nothing but the last-ditch effort of those who are fated to meet their destruction for betraying the nation, the reactionaries of history, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: S. Korean Authority Accused of Chilling Koreans' Desire for Reunification
articles.content:
S. Korean Authority Accused of Chilling Koreans' Desire for Reunification
Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet conservative group committed such anti-reunification acts as blocking an event common to the nation marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration slated to take place in Pyongyang in the wake of recently scuttling the reunification event of workers in the north and the south which their organizations planned to hold in the area of the south side on the occasion of May Day under absurd pretexts.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed article in this regard:
					
					 The above-said actions taken by the south Korean conservative authorities were promoted by their sinister scenario to totally block national reconciliation, unity and cooperation provided by the inter-Korean declarations, bring the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse and ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK at any cost in league with the United States.
					
					 The conservative group desperately torpedoed the said events for fear that successful reunification events in the north and the south might significantly stir up the atmosphere of reunification nationwide, give momentum to the south Korean people's actions against its policy for escalating confrontation with the DPRK and, consequently, deepen its ruling crisis.
					
					 The puppet group has reached an extreme phase in its moves to keep the inter-Korean relations in the present state of catastrophe and bring the situation to the brink of war.
					
					 The puppet warmongers are getting frantic in their moves to escalate confrontation and start a war, crying out for "resolute steps", "punishment" and "price" under the patronage and backing of the U.S. imperialists, their master.
					
					 Never have there been such ferocious enemies of reunification as the group of traitors who have rushed headlong into inter-Korean confrontation and a war of aggression against the DPRK while totally blocking the reunification events common to the nation.
					
					 The south Korean people are now fully ready to settle accounts with the group of traitors hell-bent on the moves to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK, not content with having brought the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse. It will have to pay a thousand-fold price for its indelible crimes.

articles.title: Taedonggang Fruit Farm Described as Monumental Structure
articles.content:
Taedonggang Fruit Farm Described as Monumental Structure
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm has been built into a great structure suited to the features of a new century under the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il who is taking much pains with the steadfast stand that a flower should be cultivated on a stone if needed for the people's happiness.
					 The birth of this modern and combined large-scale fruit farm opened up broad vistas for supplying the Pyongyang citizens with more fruits, setting a model of socialist paradise that makes one foresee the happy future in which the Korean people's ideals have been carried into reality.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an editorial.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il is working hard to bring into brilliant reality what President Kim Il Sung wished in his lifetime, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 He traveled a ceaseless journey of field guidance with his grand plan to build a modern fruit producer as required by the new century from 10 odd years ago. He took measures to erect a combined fruit farm in an excellent place and dispatched the strong manpower for its construction, including the soldier-builders of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces. It is the shining fruition of his energetic leadership that "11th scenery of Songun" has been made in the area of Wonhung in less than two years.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will bring great events delighting the whole country one after another in the drive for great surge to open the gate to a thriving nation as they made spectacular changes in Wonhung with mental power of single-minded unity, concludes the editorial.

articles.title: Solidarity with DPRK's Principled Stand Expressed
articles.content:
Solidarity with DPRK's Principled Stand Expressed
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- A political party of Russia and an organization of Ecuador expressed solidarity with the DPRK's principled stand toward the anti-DPRK smear campaign of the U.S. and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					 The Komsomolsk-Na-Amure City Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation sent a letter to the DPRK mission in Khabarovsk on June 2, in which it expressed solidarity with the DPRK government and people as regards the fact that the U.S.-led reactionaries in the world are escalating their provocative moves to stifle the DPRK by force over the case of sinking of warship "Cheonan".
					
					 The Guaranda Association for Friendship, Culture and Solidarity with the Korean People of Ecuador in its statement on May 28 fully supported the stand of the DPRK that it would resolutely react to the south Korean authorities' policy for confrontation with it.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Nepal-Korea Friendship Association, the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Committee of Nepal, the National Anti-Imperialist Forum of Nepal, the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, the Nepal Institute for the Juche Studies, the Nepal Journalist Association, the Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics, the Peace Action Committee of Nepal, the National Press Club of Nepal, the Nepalese Committee for Supporting the Reunification of Korea and the Nepalese Committee for Promotion of Reunification of Korea issued a joint statement on June 3 in support of the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK National Defence Commission, the May 28 statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry and the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					
					 The joint statement demanded that the south Korean conservative authorities promptly stop going against all the Korean people's efforts to achieve durable peace and stability of Asia and the Korean Peninsula under the banner of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, in a statement on May 31 denounced the south Korean authorities' despicable anti-DPRK smear campaign and expressed full support and solidarity with the just tough countermeasures taken by the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in France
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in France
Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Preserving the Juche Character and National Character of the Revolution and Construction" was brought out in pamphlet by the Democrate Publishing House under the Anti-Imperialist Front of France on June 1.
					 The work, published on June 19, Juche 86 (1997), elucidates the idea that preserving the Juche character and national identity in the revolution and construction serves as the fundamental principle to be maintained in accomplishing the cause of socialism and the tasks and ways to do so.

articles.title: WPK Lauded in Mexico
articles.content:
WPK Lauded in Mexico
Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism released the 41st issue of its bulletin to mark the 46th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The bulletin in an article captioned "The Workers' Party of Korea trusted by the people" said that the WPK led by Kim Jong Il has perfect mass foundation.
					
					 From the very day of its birth, the WPK has creditably discharged its mission and duty as a mass party, it noted, adding:
					
					 The WPK built a socialist state centered on the popular masses, holding high the slogan "We Serve the People!"
					
					 The WPK is absolutely supported and trusted by the people, the secret of which is the fact that it has embodied the Juche idea.
					
					 Believe in the people and rely on them and you shall always emerge victorious; if you are forsaken by them, you will always fail. This was the maxim of President Kim Il Sung, and it has served as the maxim of the WPK.
					
					 It is the duty of the WPK to exist for the people and struggle to realize their demand for independence and interests. And the supreme principle of the WPK's activities is to steadily improve the standard of people's living.
					
					 It is axiom that as a tree with deep roots does not shake in any raging wind, the WPK which has the rock-firm mass foundation while enjoying absolute trust from the people will never be shaken even under any political upheaval.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, June 9 (KCNA) -- One day in September Juche 36 (1947) anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk, accompanying President Kim Il Sung, arrived at Lagoon Samil.
					 After firing at a target floating on water, the President asked her to shoot, handing the pistol to her. 
					
					 It was not easy to hit a target playing hide-and-seek.
					
					 She took a quick aim at the target and pulled the trigger.
					
					 The officials admired the heroine for her marksmanship. Kim Jong Suk told them that though Korea was liberated, the southern half of the country was under the control of the United States and that the revolutionary soldiers of the President should be skillful in shooting in order to drive the U.S. imperialists out of south Korea and build a rich country. 
					
					 Reflected in her remarks was a profound truth that a revolutionary should not lay down his gun until the final victory of the revolution.

articles.title: Delegado coreano ante la ONU solicita aclarar caso de "Cheonan"
articles.content:
Delegado coreano ante la ONU solicita aclarar caso de "Cheonan"
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ATCC) -- En relacion con la reciente evolucion de la grave situacion dada en la Peninsula Coreana, el representante permanente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ante la ONU, Sin Son Ho, envio el dia 8 la siguiente carta a Claude Heller, presidente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU:
					  El 20 de mayo de 2010, Estados Unidos y las autoridades surcoreanas publicaron el "resultado de investigacion" que relaciono absurdamente el hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  La RPDC nego y rechazo totalmente el "resultado de investigacion" y expuso en claro su posicion de que no tiene nada que ver con el incidente, proponiendo enviar al lugar del accidente el grupo de inspeccion de su Comite de Defensa Nacional para evaluar objetivamente el "resultado de investigacion".
					
					  Seria muy util recordarnos que van creciendo las sospechas y las criticas dentro y fuera del suelo surcoreano al "resultado de investigacion" desde el mismo momento de su publicacion. 
					
					A traves del analisis cientifico militar y los detalles circunstanciales, se revela cada dia mas claramente que el incidente es una farsa inventada en funcion de los objetivos politicos y militares de EE.UU. 
					
					  La clave de la solucion del caso reside en que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, victima del caso, tenga la oportunidad de verificar y evaluar cientifica y objetivamente el "resultado de investigacion".
					
					  Es imperioso que el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU no repita el antecedente de haber sido malempleado como instrumento de arbitrariedad y hegemonia de EE.UU. al legalizar la invasion armada contra Iraq a base de una simple mentira de Powell, secretario de Estado norteamericano en febrero de 2003.
					
					  El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU tiene el deber estricto de atenerse a los principios de respeto a la soberania y la imparcialidad de los paises miembros de la ONU como esta estipulado en la Carta de la ONU.
					
					  El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU es una organizacion que tiene como su linea vital la mision de garantizar la paz y la seguridad del mundo. Si el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU desea de veras la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana, donde se dio la situacion a punto de explosion debido al incidente de la corbeta "Cheonan", debera tomar medidas que conduzcan a EE.UU. y al Sur de Corea a recibir el grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional, como ya habia propuesto la RPDC, victima del caso, para facilitar la verificacion del "resultado de investigacion".
					
					De esa manera, deberia dar la prioridad a esclarecer la verdad del incidente sobre la base imparcial y objetiva.
					
					En caso de que el "resultado de investigacion" impuesto unilateralmente se incluye en la agenda del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU y se abre el debate sin la verificacion de la parte perjudicada directamente, estara muy claro que se verian infringidas la soberania y la seguridad de la RPDC y entonces nadie podra imaginar cuan serias seran sus consecuencias sobre la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  En esta ocasion, quisiera adjuntar en esta carta una copia de la respuesta del portavoz del MINREX de la RPDC fechada 4 de junio de 2010 y pedirle la gentileza de circularla como documento oficial del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.

articles.title: Delegado coreano denuncia en Ginebra incidente del "Cheonan"
articles.content:
Delegado coreano denuncia en Ginebra incidente del "Cheonan" 
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ATCC) -- El caso de hundimiento del buque surcoreano de guerra "Cheonan" es de punta a cabo la farsa inventada por las autoridades surcoreanas bajo el abrigo de Estados Unidos.
					   Sostuvo asi el delegado coreano en su discurso pronunciado el dia 3 en la reunion de desarme de Ginebra, y continuo:
					
					  Desde el principio, con el activo respaldo de EE.UU., las autoridades surcoreanas relacionaron sin ningun fundamento con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan". 
					
					  Finalmente, publicaron el manipulado "resultado de investigacion" como si ese hundimiento fuera producido por el "ataque de torpedo" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Al hablar del "castigo" y "represalia", maniobran ahora neciamente para imponer otra "sancion" por conducto del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					  Como ya hemos aclarado, no tenemos nada que ver con el naufragio del "Cheonan".
					
					  Todo el mundo conoce que estamos librando la ofensiva general para abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera hasta el 2012.
					
					  En vista de la referencia de que la paz es la premisa del desarrollo, hoy dia, nos es mas valioso que nunca el ambiente pacifico exterior.
					
					  Cualquier persona razonable sospechara mucho de la opinion del Sur de Corea de que la RPDC esta involucrada en el incidente.
					
					  El caso sensacional como el siniestro del "Cheonan" es necesario solo a las autoridades surcoreanas que estan desesperadas por detener nuestro progreso desarrollando la campana anti-RPDC.
					
					  Es invariable la posicion del gobierno de la RPDC de preparar el solido sistema de paz y realizar la desnuclearizacion en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Cuanto mas pronto se firme el convenio de paz en la Peninsula Coreana en el estado de armisticio, tanto mas rapido se construira la confianza necesaria a la desnuclearizacion.
					
					  La concertacion del convenio de paz deviene el unico remedio racional y realista para desnuclearizar la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Fidel Castro expresa su opinion del incidente del buque "Cheonan"
articles.content:
Fidel Castro expresa su opinion del incidente del buque "Cheonan"
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente de la Revolucion Cubana, Fidel Castro Ruz, publico en la edicion del dia 4 del periodico cubano "Granma" sus reflexiones "El imperio y la mentira", en que expreso su opinion sobre el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" citando las informaciones de fuentes de inteligencia que revelaron la naturaleza de estafador de EE.UU.
					Abajo se transmiten algunos parrafos escogidos de sus reflexiones:
					
					  "Dichas fuentes sospechan que el ataque contra la corbeta de guerra antisubmarina de la Armada surcoreana Cheonan fue un ataque de bandera falsa hecho para que pareciera provenir de Corea del Norte."
					
					"Uno de los propositos principales para el aumento de las tensiones en la Peninsula Coreana era aplicar presion sobre el primer ministro japones Yukio Hatoyama para que cambiara de politica sobre el retiro de Okinawa de la base del Cuerpo de Marines de EE.UU. Hatoyama ha admitido que las tensiones por el hundimiento del Cheonan tuvieron una importante influencia en su decision de permitir que los marines de EE.UU. permanecieran en Okinawa." 
					
					"Ademas habia 4 barcos de la Armada de EE.UU. en el sector, parte del Ejercicio Foal Eagle EE.UU. - Corea del Sur, durante el hundimiento del Cheonan. Una investigacion de las huellas metalicas y quimicas del torpedo sospechoso muestra que es de produccion alemana." 
					
					"La presencia del USNS Salvor, uno de los participantes en Foal Eagle, tan cerca de la isla Paekryong durante el hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana, tambien suscita preguntas."
					
					"Asi, de forma asombrosamente facil, Estados Unidos logro resolver un importante problema: liquidar el gobierno de Unidad Nacional del Partido Democrata de Yukio Hatoyama, pero a un altisimo costo"
					
					"Los lideres politicos y la opinion mundial tienen una prueba del cinismo y la falta total de escrupulos que caracterizan la politica imperial de Estados Unidos."

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta nuevo disparate de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta nuevo disparate de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 9 de junio (ATCC) -- Recientemente, al hablar del caso de hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan", el traidor Lee Myung Bak dijo que "es necesario establecer la naturaleza del sistema" e "impartir la educacion de las nuevas generaciones" en ese contexto.
					  Este disparate parte de su siniestro intento de mantener y fortalecer el sistema de dictadura "pragmatista" de caracter proyanqui, fascista, conflictiva y anti-reunificacion reprimiendo despiadadamente, bajo el pretexto de "establecer la naturaleza del sistema" a las fuerzas progresistas que condenan el caso del "Cheonan", farsa sin precedente contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 9 y continua:
					
					  La "naturaleza del sistema" de que habla la banda de conservadores surcoreanos es precisamente la dictadura fascista antipopular, basada en el servilismo a EE.UU. y el enfrentamiento anti-reunificacion, y la historia criminal en que ella vino reprimiendo salvajemente a las fuerzas progresistas opositoras a tal regimen calificandolas de "izquierdistas y pronorcoreanas".
					
					  A pesar de ello, el mandatario surcoreano encomia esas cosas reaccionarias como "naturaleza del sistema" con el sucio objetivo de sofocar con las fuerzas el impetu anti-"gubernamental" de las fuerzas progresistas, que se hace mas fuerte con motivo del intrigante caso del "Cheonan", y mantener a toda costa su tambaleante "poder" conservador.
					
					  Lo mas grave del caso es que el  traidor Lee Myung Bak relaciono el problema de la "naturaleza del sistema" con la "educacion de las nuevas generaciones".
					
					Ya que se revelaron claramente los detalles de esa farsa anti-RPDC, la banda de traidores surcoreanos esta impacientada por la posible lucha masiva anti-"gubernamental" de los jovenes, estudiantes y habitantes para condenarla.
					
					   A partir de este temor, Lee Myung Bak dijo enfatico que hay que "impartir la educacion de las generaciones venideras" tomando en cuenta la "naturaleza del sistema".
					
					  Esta orden fascista significa que la educacion debe orientarse a formar a las generaciones venideras como las dociles que no sepan rebelarse contra el sistema de dictadura proyanqui.
					
					  Los alborotados movimientos de la camarilla de titeres surcoreanos en torno a la "naturaleza del sistema" no pasan de ser los ultimos esfuerzos de los traidores a la nacion y los reaccionarios de la historia, condenados a la bancarrota.
